metadata.Title: CVE-2022-22629 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling. Thisissue is fixed in macOS Monterey 12.3, Safari 15.4, watchOS 8.5, iTunes12.12.3 for Windows, iOS 15.4 and iPadOS 15.4, tvOS 15.4. Processingmaliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-22629` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.36.0-2ubuntu1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.36.0-2ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.36.0-2ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.36.0-2ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.36.0-2ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.36.0-2ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.36.0-2ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.36.0-2ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.36.0-2ubuntu1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.36.0-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.36.0-2ubuntu1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
